ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: No the shaman spell is 50hp for 25 mana. Naeeldar ... From: Miriana  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date: Monday, October 04,
ygData.messageBody:
No the shaman spell is 50hp for 25 mana.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Miriana <miriana@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, October 04, 1999 4:55 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


>From: Miriana <miriana@...>
>
>On Mon, 4 Oct 1999, Naeeldar wrote:
>
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> Heh yes well the shaman form of the spell is a lot more efficent then the
>> mana stone. The necro form of it is the best in the game the level 34
spell
>> for it trades 15hp for 15mana. The manastone is not that efficent at all.
>>
> Absolutely not. The shaman spell is 60 hp for 20 mana, exactly
>the same. The only difference is Shaman get regen rather early and can
>get an advantage out of using the stone without outside assistance.
>
>Miriana Windryder
>
>>
